mapper.insert:
insert into demo.res_school(school_code, school_name, school_abbr, english_name, english_abbr, key_school, org_structure, project_211, province, city, online_dept, anniversary_date, competent_dept, graduate_school, school_type, school_nature, adult_edu_dept, party_secretary, discipline_count, legal_representative, legal_cert_no, sponsor, principal, establish_date, homepage_url, fax, postal_code, contact_phone, email, address, intro, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.schoolCode}, #{entity.schoolName}, #{entity.schoolAbbr}, #{entity.englishName}, #{entity.englishAbbr}, #{entity.keySchool}, #{entity.orgStructure}, #{entity.project211}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.onlineDept}, #{entity.anniversaryDate}, #{entity.competentDept}, #{entity.graduateSchool}, #{entity.schoolType}, #{entity.schoolNature}, #{entity.adultEduDept}, #{entity.partySecretary}, #{entity.disciplineCount}, #{entity.legalRepresentative}, #{entity.legalCertNo}, #{entity.sponsor}, #{entity.principal}, #{entity.establishDate}, #{entity.homepageUrl}, #{entity.fax}, #{entity.postalCode}, #{entity.contactPhone}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.intro}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into demo.res_school(school_code, school_name, school_abbr, english_name, english_abbr, key_school, org_structure, project_211, province, city, online_dept, anniversary_date, competent_dept, graduate_school, school_type, school_nature, adult_edu_dept, party_secretary, discipline_count, legal_representative, legal_cert_no, sponsor, principal, establish_date, homepage_url, fax, postal_code, contact_phone, email, address, intro, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.schoolCode}, #{entity.schoolName}, #{entity.schoolAbbr}, #{entity.englishName}, #{entity.englishAbbr}, #{entity.keySchool}, #{entity.orgStructure}, #{entity.project211}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.onlineDept}, #{entity.anniversaryDate}, #{entity.competentDept}, #{entity.graduateSchool}, #{entity.schoolType}, #{entity.schoolNature}, #{entity.adultEduDept}, #{entity.partySecretary}, #{entity.disciplineCount}, #{entity.legalRepresentative}, #{entity.legalCertNo}, #{entity.sponsor}, #{entity.principal}, #{entity.establishDate}, #{entity.homepageUrl}, #{entity.fax}, #{entity.postalCode}, #{entity.contactPhone}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.intro}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update school_code = values(school_code) , school_name = values(school_name) , school_abbr = values(school_abbr) , english_name = values(english_name) , english_abbr = values(english_abbr) , key_school = values(key_school) , org_structure = values(org_structure) , project_211 = values(project_211) , province = values(province) , city = values(city) , online_dept = values(online_dept) , anniversary_date = values(anniversary_date) , competent_dept = values(competent_dept) , graduate_school = values(graduate_school) , school_type = values(school_type) , school_nature = values(school_nature) , adult_edu_dept = values(adult_edu_dept) , party_secretary = values(party_secretary) , discipline_count = values(discipline_count) , legal_representative = values(legal_representative) , legal_cert_no = values(legal_cert_no) , sponsor = values(sponsor) , principal = values(principal) , establish_date = values(establish_date) , homepage_url = values(homepage_url) , fax = values(fax) , postal_code = values(postal_code) , contact_phone = values(contact_phone) , email = values(email) , address = values(address) , intro = values(intro) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time)
